articles.title: Coronavirus lockdown: Despondency in adults can quickly spread to their children in times like these,... - Firstpost
articles.description: The mix of information and misinformation, and exaggerated fears of the situation, result in symptoms of anxiety of various kinds depending on the age of the child, warns child and adolescent psychiatrist Dr Amit Sen.
